project.name: Your project name
project.gitHubToken: Your github personal access token. See: https://help.github.com/articles/creating-an-access-token-for-command-line-use/
project.trelloToken: Your trello access token. Run 'review trello', allow access and paste token here.
project.trelloBoardId: Board ID of the board you want to search for cards

gitHubTags: Run this command when one of the tags are present on the gitHub issue
trelloTags: Run if one of the tag is present on the trello card
